title: 7 of the best stripy baby dungarees
text:
Meghan, Meghan Markle holds baby Archie as he meets Archbishop Desmond Tutu in Cape Town on September 25, 2019 [Photo: Getty]

Baby Archie, the Duke and Duchess of Sussex’s son, undertook his first official engagement during the royal tour of South Africa.

The four-month-old royal, who Meghan Markle and Prince Harry welcomed on 6 May 2019 accompanied his parents on their 10-day tour - and emerged as one of the trip’s highlights.

Archie was taken for a meeting with Archbishop Desmund Tutu in Cape Town on the second day of the tour and donned his finest attire for the occasion: a £12.99 pair of striped dungarees from H&M’s ethical ‘Concious’ range.

The dungarees, made out of organic cotton, were worn over a plain white bodysuit and grey/blue £13 socks from Bonpoint.

READ MORE: Meghan Markle donates baby Archie’s second-hand clothes to HIV organisation

The dungarees naturally sold out shortly after, proving that the young royal has just as much sartorial selling power as his mother.

But there are many other similar styles available, enabling youngsters globally to emulate Archie’s style.

Shop Archie’s look:

Dungarees and Bodysuit by H&M | £12.99 | Shop here

Ribbed Socks by Bonpoint | £13 | Shop here

Shop similar dungarees:

1. Striped Dungarees and T-Shirt Set by Alex And Alexa | £21 | Shop here

2. Unisex Cotton Romper by Amazon | from £6.19 | Shop here

3. Baby Striped Cotton Overalls by Tatine Et Chocolat | £53 | Shop here

4. Blue Stripe Romper by JoJo Maman Bebe | £19 | Shop here

5. Striped Dungaree Set by Mini Boden | £24 | Shop here

Story continues
description: At four-months-old, Meghan and Harry's son Archie is already something of a style icon: shop his debut royal engagement outfit.
